title: Web Development
desc: Custom websites built with modern frameworks (Laravel, Vue, React, Alpine.js). Responsive, fast, and SEO-friendly.

title: System Maintenance
desc: Regular updates, bug fixes, security patches, and performance optimization for your existing web applications.

title: Final Year Projects
desc: Assistance with IT/Engineering final projects (Skripsi/TA), including coding, documentation, and consultation.

title: IoT Solutions
desc: End-to-end IoT development: sensor integration, data transmission (MQTT/HTTP), and dashboard monitoring.

title: Schematic Design
desc: Professional electronic schematic diagrams tailored to your specific project requirements.

title: PCB Design
desc: Custom PCB layout design (Eagle/KiCad/EasyEDA), from single-layer to multi-layer boards.

title: Hardware Assembly
desc: Component soldering, casing assembly, and full hardware integration testing.
